unified_fields.name: project_id
unified_fields.description: BioProject accession identifying a collection of related samples
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Unique identifier from NCBI BioProject (PRJNA/PRJEB format)

unified_fields.name: sample_id
unified_fields.description: BioSample accession for individual biological samples
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Unique identifier for a physical sample collected from a subject

unified_fields.name: run_id
unified_fields.description: Sequencing run accession identifier from SRA/ENA archives
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Identifier for a specific sequencing run (SRR/ERR format)

unified_fields.name: taxon_id
unified_fields.description: NCBI Taxonomy identifier for microbial species or genus
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Standard taxonomic identifier from NCBI Taxonomy database

unified_fields.name: taxon_name
unified_fields.description: Scientific name of the microbial taxon

unified_fields.name: relative_abundance
unified_fields.description: Proportion of a taxon in a sample (0-1 scale)
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Normalized abundance value representing proportion of total community

unified_fields.name: read_count
unified_fields.description: Number of sequencing reads mapped to a taxon
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Raw count of sequencing reads assigned to a taxonomic unit

unified_fields.name: phenotype
unified_fields.description: Disease or health status annotation for a sample
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Clinical phenotype or condition associated with the sample

unified_fields.name: phenotype_mesh_id
unified_fields.description: Medical Subject Headings identifier for standardized phenotype
unified_fields.semantic_definition: MeSH term ID for disease/condition standardization

unified_fields.name: sequencing_type
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Sequencing technology/approach (16S rRNA or whole-genome shotgun)

unified_fields.name: host_age
unified_fields.description: Age of the human subject in years
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Subject age at time of sample collection

unified_fields.name: host_sex
unified_fields.description: Biological sex of the human subject

unified_fields.name: host_bmi
unified_fields.description: Body mass index of the human subject
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Weight in kg divided by height in meters squared

unified_fields.name: country
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Geographic location where sample was collected

unified_fields.name: gene_id
unified_fields.description: Gene catalog identifier for microbial gene
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Unique identifier for a microbial gene in reference catalog

unified_fields.name: gene_symbol
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Standard gene symbol for host (human/mouse) genes

unified_fields.name: direction
unified_fields.description: Direction of change (increased, decreased, or altered)
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Whether taxon/gene is elevated or reduced in condition vs control

unified_fields.name: effect_size
unified_fields.description: Magnitude of association between taxon/gene and phenotype

unified_fields.name: pmid
unified_fields.semantic_definition: NCBI PubMed ID linking to publication

unified_fields.name: enterotype
unified_fields.semantic_definition: One of three dominant enterotype classifications

unified_fields.name: visit_number
unified_fields.description: Sequential number indicating order of clinical visits

unified_fields.name: fma_body_site
unified_fields.description: Foundational Model of Anatomy term for sample location
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Ontology term for anatomical body site

unified_fields.name: mixs
unified_fields.description: Minimum Information about any (x) Sequence metadata fields
unified_fields.semantic_definition: GSC standard metadata including biome, collection_date, geo_loc_name

unified_fields.name: checksums
unified_fields.semantic_definition: MD5, SHA1, SHA256 hashes for data integrity

unified_fields.name: matrix_type
unified_fields.description: Classification of processed abundance data type
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Type of community or functional profile matrix

unified_fields.name: kegg_ko
unified_fields.description: KEGG Ortholog identifier for functional annotation
unified_fields.semantic_definition: KEGG Orthology ID for gene function

unified_fields.name: tissue
unified_fields.description: Tissue or organ where gene expression was measured
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Anatomical location of host gene expression change

unified_fields.name: model
unified_fields.description: Model system used in the experiment

unified_fields.name: fold_change
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Ratio of expression in treatment vs control

GMrepo.name: marker_count
GMrepo.description: Number of marker taxa for a phenotype

GMrepo.name: study_count
GMrepo.description: Number of supporting studies for marker association

HMP.name: exp_length
HMP.description: Expected number of bases or reads in sequence file

HMP.name: subtype
HMP.description: Classification distinguishing host vs microbiome data

HMP.name: pride_id
HMP.description: PRIDE archive identifier for proteomics data

MetaHIT.name: sample_origin
MetaHIT.description: Source sample ID for gene catalog entry

unified_fields.name: body_site
unified_fields.description: Specific anatomical location for microbiome sampling
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Anatomical sampling location within major body region

unified_fields.name: supersite
unified_fields.description: Major body region grouping multiple body sites
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Top-level anatomical classification (5 categories in HMP)

unified_fields.name: site_code
unified_fields.description: Hierarchical site code for body location

unified_fields.name: fma_body_site
unified_fields.description: Foundational Model of Anatomy ontology term for body site
unified_fields.semantic_definition: FMA/UBERON ontology identifier for anatomical location

unified_fields.name: taxon_id
unified_fields.description: NCBI Taxonomy identifier for microbial species

unified_fields.name: taxon_name
unified_fields.description: Scientific name of the microbial taxon

unified_fields.name: relative_abundance
unified_fields.description: Proportion of taxon in sample (0-1 scale)

unified_fields.name: cultivation_status
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Whether species is cultivated and named

unified_fields.name: shannon
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Alpha diversity metric measuring species richness and evenness

unified_fields.name: observed_species
unified_fields.description: Number of species detected in sample

unified_fields.name: health_status
unified_fields.description: Health or disease status of subject

unified_fields.name: gc_content
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Proportion of guanine and cytosine bases

unified_fields.name: gene_count
unified_fields.description: Number of predicted genes in genome

unified_fields.name: type_strain
unified_fields.description: Type strain designation for species definition

unified_fields.name: oral_sites
unified_fields.description: Oral cavity locations where taxon is found
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Specific oral habitats for the taxon

mBodyMap.name: sample_count
mBodyMap.description: Number of samples for body site

mBodyMap.name: study_count
mBodyMap.description: Number of studies for body site

mBodyMap.name: dominant_phyla
mBodyMap.description: Most abundant phyla at body site

unified_fields.name: microbe_taxid
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Standard taxonomic identifier from NCBI Taxonomy

unified_fields.name: microbe_name
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Species or genus name of microbial organism

unified_fields.name: mesh_id
unified_fields.semantic_definition: MeSH controlled vocabulary ID for disease

unified_fields.name: doid
unified_fields.semantic_definition: DO identifier for standardized disease naming

unified_fields.name: direction
unified_fields.description: Direction of change in disease context
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Whether microbe is increased, decreased, or altered in disease

unified_fields.name: effect
unified_fields.description: Effect type on host target or pathway
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Molecular effect of metabolite on target

unified_fields.name: pmid
unified_fields.semantic_definition: NCBI PubMed ID linking to publication

unified_fields.name: sample_size
unified_fields.description: Total number of subjects in study

unified_fields.name: cases
unified_fields.description: Number of disease cases in study

unified_fields.name: controls
unified_fields.description: Number of healthy controls in study

unified_fields.name: metabolite_name
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Common or systematic name of metabolite

unified_fields.name: chebi_id
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Chemical Entities of Biological Interest ID

unified_fields.name: gpr
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Boolean expression linking genes to reaction

unified_fields.name: reversibility
unified_fields.semantic_definition: Can reaction proceed in both directions

shared_fields_across_all_subcategories.name: taxon_id/microbe_taxid
shared_fields_across_all_subcategories.description: NCBI Taxonomy identifier - universal microbial identifier

microbial_taxonomy.description: Fields for identifying and classifying microbial organisms

sample_metadata.description: Fields describing sample and subject characteristics

host_microbe_interactions.description: Fields describing interactions between microbes and host

body_site_classification.description: Anatomical location and body site classification
